entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
